details.publicNotes: The dust badger is a large, angry, mammal native to the plains and forests of Everglow. They stand about five feet at the shoulder with a long squat body. Their fur is a dusky orange-red with long hairs that fluff out on end when threatened. Thickly packed muscles help them dig out burrows with their shovellike claws. Their long pointed faces are durable and shield-like, to help it push earth out of its way and to crush stones, crystals, and ores in its mighty jaws. They feast on minerals, insects, and metals that they unearth in their digging. The Dust Badger turns those minerals and bits of shells into a protective sort of dusting that covers its body, like dandruff. When startled or angry, they can puff up their bodies and shake out a cloud of powerfully spiced minerals and salts that can burn the eyes and noses of those that would threaten it. The spice made by the Dust Badger is especially prized by Earth Ponies, Dwarves, and other people with deep ties to the earth of Everglow.

description.value: If the Dust Badger would be required to roll a Wisdom Saving throw, it may use its reaction to increase their result by one level of success. Additionally, they gain +2 to all attacks until they score a critical hit. As long as they have this bonus to attacks, they cannot use this ability.

rules.text: The Dust Badger's +2 to all attacks lasts until they score a critical hit.
rules.title: {item|name}

description.value: The Dust Badger makes two Claw attacks against a creature it can reach. Both count toward its multiple attack penalty, but the penalty increases only after both attacks are made.

Requirement The Dust Badger reduces an enemy to zero hit points.

Effect The Dust Badger may Stride.

The Dust Badger shakes out its fur, releasing a cloud of spicy dust in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15]{15 foot radius} centered on it. All creatures within the mist become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}, and all creatures outside the mist become concealed to creatures within it. Creatures that start their turn within the cloud take @Check[fortitude] save as the spicy mixture burns their eyes and orifices. The cloud persists for 1 minute or until strong winds, such as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.g8QqHpv2CWDwmIm1]{Gust of Wind} spell, blow it away. The Dust Badger is immune to the effects of this ability.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes @Damage[2d4[poison]].

Failure The target takes 4d4 damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target takes @Damage[8d4[poison]] and is blinded for 1 minute.
